name: TENSION [Prototype]
description:
The OU GDA student organization's Visual Art Committee worked on art assets for a hypothetical RPG game named TENSION, and a prototype was made in Godot to demonstrate our progress.
There's nothing much to see in the game, just two rooms and some NPCs.

Our concept art is displayed along with the screenshots on this page.

Art was made by Alexander Lunsford, Jorge Tejada, and Rachelle Phipps.

The two music tracks are just some sketchy tunes I had made a few years ago.

The future of TENSION is not determined; the committee plans to move on to other projects.
